careers.description: If you think you can work with us, send us your resume so we can review and contact you as soon as possible.

hero.title: cooperate with us
hero.description: Believing that the main capital of any organization is its human resources, Parnian Gostar Protosanj Company has put the recruitment of expert and hard-working people at the top of its human resources development strategies and has formulated special solutions by creating equal job opportunities for all graduates. Recruiting and organizing the recruitment of selected and qualified people to create and develop an outstanding and distinguished expert and managerial body
